title: Why do I have to play with premades?
body:
Well was in Champion Select with another lovely premade:

Person 1: shitt instalock %%%%t
Person 1: :)
Person 1: go thumb your dads uncle you twisted fuckwitt
Person 1: :)
Person 2: Dont worry man his parent will die of cancer soon :D
Person 3: wtf

Long story short ban all premades or let me choose if I want to play with the degenerate masses.

Thanks,

~ORION~
